Chapter 1: Blood Hypertension measurement Recommendation 1. 1: We recommend standardized office blood pressure measurement in preference to routine office blood pressure measurement for the management of High blood pressure in adults (1B). Practice Point 1. 3: Oscillometric devices can be used to measure blood pressure among patients with atrial fibrillation.
